abstract: Tehran Revolutionary Court schedules final hearing in espionage trial of Washington Post reporter Jason Rezaian; it is not known when verdict may be announced.
lead_paragraph: The trial of Jason Rezaian, a Washington Post correspondent held in Tehran for over a year, “may now finally be nearing its end,” The Post’s executive editor said.

headline.main: Final Hearing for Reporter Held in Iran Is Scheduled for Monday
headline.print_headline: Final Hearing for Reporter Held in Iran Is Scheduled for Monday
